pkgmetadata.longdescription: Propensity to Cycle Tool // Functions and example data to teach and increase the reproducibility of the methods and code underlying the Propensity to Cycle Tool (PCT), a research project and web application hosted at https://www.pct.bike/. For an academic paper on the methods, see Lovelace et al (2017) doi:10.5198/jtlu.2016.862.
